doc:
Sprague Grayden https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprague_Grayden 0 Sprague Grayden (born July 21, 1980) is an American actress. She played schoolteacher Heather Lisinski in the television drama Jericho, Karen Kawalski in John Doe, first daughter Olivia Taylor in the television thriller 24, and Kristi Rey in the films Paranormal Activity 2 and 3. Sprague_Grayden ( born July_21_,_1980 ) is an_American_actress . She played schoolteacher_Heather_Lisinski in the_television_drama_Jericho , Karen_Kawalski in John_Doe , first_daughter_Olivia_Taylor in the_television_thriller_24 , and Kristi_Rey in the_films_Paranormal_Activity 2_and_3 .
